akn:section.akn:heading: Disclosure requirements for open end consumer credit plans secured by consumer’s principal dwelling

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Application disclosures In the case of any open end consumer credit plan which provides for any extension of credit which is secured by the consumer’s principal dwelling, the creditor shall make the following disclosures in accordance with subsection (b):

(c) Third party applications In the case of an application to open an account under any open end consumer credit plan described in subsection (a) which is provided to a consumer by any person other than the creditor—
(d) “Principal dwelling” defined For purposes of this section and sections 1647 and 1665b of this title, the term “principal dwelling” includes any second or vacation home of the consumer.
